title: Ethereum Must Do Better — Vitalik’s Live Speech

cleanText:
Cool. Okay, great. So, hello everyone. Um, hope you've been having a great ETHCC. Uh, so, you know, first of all, you know, thank you to uh, you know, Jerome for organizing uh, such a a lovely event and uh, constantly figuring out how to do it very well in a new city for a couple of years in a row.
